last_episode_to_air.name: Legacy
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the final countdown, the fate of everyone is uncertain.

name: Wentworth
overview: Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison. A modern adaptation and sequel of the iconic Prisoner series.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Fans of the iconic Prisoner Cell Block H series, which pushed boundaries over three decades ago and still boasts a loyal following worldwide today, will remember Bea Smith as gutsy and fearless, ruling Wentworth Correctional Centre with an iron fist. But who was Bea Smith before prison? How did a wife and mother from the suburbs become a top dog without rival? Wentworth Prison is a dynamic, often confronting, drama series that begins with Bea's early days in prison.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The second season picks up three months after Bea Smith murdered Jacs Holt. While Bea was suffering in the slot, Franky Doyle rose to the position of top dog unopposed. However, the introduction of a new governor, Joan Ferguson is about to shake everything up.By season's end, Bea Smith commits her third murder.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: As the story resumes four months have passed since Bea Smith's bold escape and ruthless murder of Brayden Holt.  Having returned to Wentworth Correctional Centre, Bea has assumed the  mantle of Top Dog, hailed by all – including Franky Doyle herself – as a  worthy successor. Franky may no longer be Top Dog but she's not about  to forget how Liz lagged on her, and Boomer is set to make Liz pay.  Doreen's baby bump is growing and Ferguson is watching her closely.  While Vera's instincts are more attuned to Ferguson's scheming, Will is  none the wiser despite Fletch's apparent hit and run accident

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: It’s been four months since the fire at Wentworth and Bea and the other inmates have been housed offsite while they wait for construction to be completed. Series 4 sees Bea battle two formidable enemies. There is Kaz, made so dangerous by her extremist feminist ideology, who regards Bea as the great betrayer to the cause, and Ferguson, who is on a mission to exonerate herself for the death of Jess – the walls of Wentworth will not be enough to protect the Top Dog. Franky is focused on making it on the outside and while home life with Bridget isn’t perfect, they are navigating the terrain together. Vera has finally achieved the Governorship and while she thinks she is the upper hand with Ferguson, her control is short-lived. Liz, Doreen, Maxine and Boomer return in the latest series loyal to Bea but the bond is tested as Kaz sets out to undermine the status quo of Wentworth and weaknesses are exposed.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Bea awakes blissfully happy after a night with Allie but it is the eve of Ferguson's trial and the Freak has been relentless in putting the final touches to her scheme for freedom and exoneration. Liz becomes convinced of Sonia's innocence and then Don puts an offer to Liz which could change her life. Maxine is committed to the chemotherapy and her prison family rallies around her.

seasons.name: The Final Sentence
seasons.overview: When the gates of Wentworth Correctional Centre open on the final season, three weeks have passed since the shivving of Allie (Kate Jenkinson). With Allie’s attacker still at large, no one, least of all the H1 family, realize that they have a terrorist and would-be murderer, Judy Bryant (Vivienne Awosoga), in their midst.

episodes.name: No Place Like Home
episodes.overview: Bea Smith enters prison after being charged with the attempted murder of her husband. Bea is separated from her daughter and sent to Wentworth on remand. She is then forced to learn how the prison works.

episodes.name: Fly Me Away
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the riot, Will blackmails Doreen into helping him and Bea is given no choice but to continue to lie.

episodes.name: The Girl Who Waited
episodes.overview: Bea is caught up in the brutal rivalry between Franky and Jacs while Erica struggles to gain the support of the officers.

episodes.name: The Things We Do
episodes.overview: Franky teaches Bea a tough lesson; Liz struggles with old demons; Franky stirs up new feelings in Erica

episodes.name: The Velvet Curtain
episodes.overview: Erica can’t escape her feelings for Franky and Bea reveals to Liz the truth about her marriage.

episodes.name: Captive
episodes.overview: Vera's attempt to impress Fletch backfires and her domineering mother reveals a humiliating secret to her peers, while Erica betrays Franky.

episodes.name: Something Dies
episodes.overview: Bea pays a high price for crossing Jacs while Franky gets her revenge, and Will reverts to his old ways.

episodes.name: Mind Games
episodes.overview: To gain back control of Wentworth Jacs makes a final play to break Bea.

episodes.name: To The Moon
episodes.overview: Bea is buoyed by the inmate's support, while Jacs's power further diminishes and Vera and Fletch's date comes to a humiliating end.

episodes.name: Checkmate
episodes.overview: The truth behind the riot is finally revealed and Bea confronts a killer leading to deadly consequences.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Fans of the iconic Prisoner Cell Block H series, which pushed boundaries over three decades ago and still boasts a loyal following worldwide today, will remember Bea Smith as gutsy and fearless, ruling Wentworth Correctional Centre with an iron fist. But who was Bea Smith before prison? How did a wife and mother from the suburbs become a top dog without rival? Wentworth Prison is a dynamic, often confronting, drama series that begins with Bea's early days in prison.

episodes.name: Born Again
episodes.overview: Three months after Jacs death, new arrival Joan Ferguson makes an enemy of Franky, while Bea discovers a new purpose.

episodes.name: Whatever It Takes
episodes.overview: Bea attempts to get revenge on Brayden by goading Harry into an act of violence, whilst Franky's determination to maintain power pushes her to extreme lengths.

episodes.name: Boys in the Yard
episodes.overview: Following the failure of Harry to avenge their daughter's death, Bea hatches a daring plot to lure Brayden Holt to the jail.

episodes.name: The Danger Within
episodes.overview: Bea faces down an assassination attempt from the Holt clan. While new inmates enter the compound.

episodes.name: Twist the Knife
episodes.overview: Bea discovers Simmo has a weakness she can exploit for her own ends. Meanwhile Fletch and Will face off in a confrontation that will end their friendship for good.

episodes.name: The Pink Dragon
episodes.overview: Simmo's attempt to kill Bea ends in tragedy, while Liz faces her greatest dilemma: to snitch or not to snitch.

episodes.name: Metamorphosis
episodes.overview: When Ferguson psychologically manipulates Vera she crosses a point of no return whilst Maxine orchestrates a desperate bid to see her spurned lover.

episodes.name: Sins of the Mother
episodes.overview: An isolated and paranoid Franky tries to uncover which inmate is leaking vital information to Ferguson.

episodes.name: The Fixer
episodes.overview: When Ferguson discovers Doreen is the pregnant prisoner, the Governor threatens to have Nash's parole revoked unless she lies about the father. Will is publicly accused of an inappropriate relationship with Bea.

episodes.name: Jail Birds
episodes.overview: Liz struggles to adjust to life on the outside and tries to reconnect with her estranged children. Meanwhile, Derek Channing tries to build his case against Ferguson.

episodes.name: Into the Night
episodes.overview: As Bea and Franky go to war for control of the prison, Bea puts her daring plan in motion. Meanwhile, Fletch is on a downward spiral of self-destructive behaviour as his final day at Wentworth looms.

episodes.name: Fear Her
episodes.overview: The extent of Bea's plan is revealed as she makes the final moves to avenge Debbie's death. Meanwhile Franky realises she is losing the support of the women and is forced to consider a deal.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The second season picks up three months after Bea Smith murdered Jacs Holt. While Bea was suffering in the slot, Franky Doyle rose to the position of top dog unopposed. However, the introduction of a new governor, Joan Ferguson is about to shake everything up.By season's end, Bea Smith commits her third murder.

episodes.name: The Governor's Pleasure
episodes.overview: When Bea is sentenced to life without parole for the killing of Brayden Holt, Ferguson makes it very clear - she owns Bea now. So when Bea uses her standing as Top Dog to hit back, Ferguson takes revenge - she slots Bea and releases Liz from Protection, exposing Liz to a brutal bashing from Boomer. But Ferguson has underestimated Bea, who starts a riot amongst the prisoners. With the prison in lock-down Ferguson has to turn to Bea to quell the riot. Wentworth isn't Ferguson's prison - it's Bea's. Battle lines are drawn.

episodes.name: Failing Upwards
episodes.overview: Following the riot, Bea must balance an uneasy peace with Ferguson with the needs and expectations of the women. Ferguson wants to stamp out drugs inside the prison and for obvious reasons Bea finds herself on common ground with the Governor. But when it becomes clear that Ferguson wants Franky's head for it, Bea must wonder if, rather than help her cement her position as Top Dog, it may indeed be a ruse to undermine it. Meanwhile, Liz has a difficult reunion with her daughter Sophie and is unsure when Doreen proposes she be the alternate carer when the baby comes. Will is in a happy place and seems to finally be able to put the past behind him is shocked when he is the focus of a murder investigation.

episodes.name: Knives Out
episodes.overview: Franky's under fire. With her supply cut and her powerbase decimated, she's on her own when prisoners come after her to claim what they're owed. Bridget identifies Franky as someone she could really help, but Franky refuses to engage, venting her frustration by trashing the Education Unit. Meanwhile Bea is concerned at the police interest in Will, and shocked when he makes a startling confession.

episodes.name: Righteous Acts
episodes.overview: After being slotted for an aggressive confrontation with Ferguson, Liz's world is rocked with the arrival of a new prisoner. Franky has commenced her sessions with Bridget, and in a candid moment admits to a desire for revenge against Bea. When Bea is shivved in the yard, Franky comes under suspicion, but Bea quickly realises Jodie, freshly released from the Slot where she was terrorised by Ferguson, was behind the attack at the Governor's behest.

episodes.name: Mercy
episodes.overview: As Fletch makes a difficult return to work at Wentworth, he is troubled by an incident that leads him to suspect his accident was no accident at all.

episodes.name: Evidence
episodes.overview: Ferguson is blindsided by Jodie’s complaint to the ombudsman. Channing attempts damage control, but Jodie’s accusations of brutality promise to be very damaging for the Governor

episodes.name: The Long Game
episodes.overview: Bea struggles to accept that she had a psychotic episode, despite the CCTV evidence. When her blood is found to have traces of LSD, she realises that her attacker caused the meltdown. She smuggles evidence out of the psych unit, understanding she'll need to play the long game if she's going to defeat Ferguson. Meanwhile Bridget struggles to force Franky to accept that she has an emotional block. But when she challenges Franky to talk about her mother, she elicits a confession she wasn't expecting.

episodes.name: Goldfish
episodes.overview: When Ferguson's pet goldfish dies, she identifies her lack of emotion at the death as a potential weakness, rather than strength. But in seeking a renewed connection with Doreen, Ferguson unwittingly makes herself vulnerable when she calls Doreen - Jianna. Bea sees this as a possible chink in her armour and tasks Doreen with uncovering the truth behind the name.

episodes.name: Freak Show
episodes.overview: Vera's faith in her Governor is put to the test. Meanwhile, Bea finds herself at her lowest ebb as she realizes her war against Ferguson is having an effect on those closest to her.

episodes.name: A Higher Court
episodes.overview: Franky’s parole hearing is brought forward but will she be granted a released? Meanwhile, Doreen faces an agonising choice.

episodes.name: The Living and the Dead
episodes.overview: When Fletch follows Bea's instructions to use Jianna as a means to unsettle Ferguson, he unwittingly sets Vera up to take the fall. Vera, for her part, is consumed with a desire for revenge against Lucy for infecting her with Hep C. Meanwhile, Bea's manipulations of Fletch result in him finally recovering his memory and alerting Will, who is on the verge of being arrested for Harry's murder, to the truth behind Ferguson's manipulations. As the forces align against Ferguson, she begins to unravel, realising she is in a fight of her life, professionally and personally.

episodes.name: Blood and Fire
episodes.overview: Ferguson is losing control, and the walls are closing in. Fletch and Vera band together in an attempt to overthrow the Governor, while Bea discovers the final piece of the puzzle to help solve Harry's murder. Meanwhile, Franky is preparing for her release. But when Jess makes a sudden, drastic move, all plans are thrown out the window and the stage is set for a dramatic showdown.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: As the story resumes four months have passed since Bea Smith's bold escape and ruthless murder of Brayden Holt.  Having returned to Wentworth Correctional Centre, Bea has assumed the  mantle of Top Dog, hailed by all – including Franky Doyle herself – as a  worthy successor. Franky may no longer be Top Dog but she's not about  to forget how Liz lagged on her, and Boomer is set to make Liz pay.  Doreen's baby bump is growing and Ferguson is watching her closely.  While Vera's instincts are more attuned to Ferguson's scheming, Will is  none the wiser despite Fletch's apparent hit and run accident

episodes.name: First Blood
episodes.overview: The women of H Block return to Wentworth after the rebuild to find a new dynamic in play — Vera is governor, Will is deputy and Kaz Proctor has established a power base. Bea questions whether she has the stamina or desire to be Top Dog for the next forty years of her sentence. On the outside, Franky is trying hard to be a productive member of society. As always, no-one should underestimate "the Freak".

episodes.name: Poking Spiders
episodes.overview: Feeling betrayed, Vera takes steps to have Bridget dismissed and expose her relationship with Franky, but is forced to backtrack and enlist Bridget s help instead, when Ferguson makes a bid to be released into the general prison population. The three unlikely allies devise a plan in which Bridget attempts to entrap Ferguson into exposing her psychopathy. Kaz stages a protest with the women in the yard in an attempt to force Vera s hand on the conjugal visits program.

episodes.name: Prisoner
episodes.overview: Against Vera's wishes, Ferguson is released into general. The women are out for blood but Vera confines Ferguson to her cell for safety reasons. When Ferguson challenges Vera's decision, she's left bewildered and wondering whether Ferguson has a death-wish. As always, Ferguson has an endgame but will she live to accomplish it?

episodes.name: Screw Lover
episodes.overview: Ferguson, having found protection in Kaz's crew, cunningly blames Will for her brutal ganging, a move which only strengthens Kaz's support for her. When Bea defends Will, it backfires dramatically. She is painted as a screw-lover, and rapidly begins to lose the support of the women. The first ever conjugal visit takes place at the prison, and Boomer shamelessly attempts to impregnate herself to her deadbeat ex-boyfriend, Daz. Meanwhile, Maxine is diagnosed with breast cancer and can't bring herself to tell the other women.

episodes.name: Love And Hate
episodes.overview: With Bea in the slot, Ferguson intensifies her manipulation of Kaz. Seizing on the recent death of her father that sends Kaz into an inexplicable spiral Ferguson realises that Kaz was a victim of abuse at his hands. Ferguson uses her own troubled relationship with her father as a means of form a closer bond with Kaz. When new Indigenous inmate, Tasha, is put under Doreen s care, Ferguson sees an opportunity to force Kaz into action against Bea. With Maxine as acting Top Dog, Ferguson places Tasha in Lucy's orbit and when Tasha breaks the rules by protecting herself from Lucy's molestation, Maxine appears to have no choice but to punish Tasha. Ferguson urges Kaz to stand up to Maxine and save the innocent girl from abuse at the hands of a man , thereby tapping into Kaz's past trauma. Bea and Ally's bond is cemented when they are slotted in adjoining cells and spend hours talking.

episodes.name: Divide and Conquer
episodes.overview: Bea is released from the slot and is immediately confronted by Lucy; if Bea doesn't punish Tasha for breaking prison rules, Lucy and her crew will be forced to. Doreen shocks everyone by turning her back on Bea and Liz is assigned to look after a new inmate, Sonia Stevens, on remand for the supposed murder of a young woman.

episodes.name: Panic Button
episodes.overview: Ferguson is rattled when she discovers that Bea will be supporting Jesper’s evidence in court. Meanwhile, Bea seems to be losing control of the women so she forces a prison-wide vote to end the debate. Vera is privately determined that Bea maintains control and interferes with the votes, cementing Bea’s power. When Kaz gets sentenced for 12-years, Ferguson unveils her plan and urges Kaz to help her. In return, she’ll take out Bea Smith.

episodes.name: Plan Bea
episodes.overview: As Bea and Allie take their illicit affair further, Bea finds herself uncharacteristically tentative and vulnerable. Neither is aware that Ferguson is tracking them carefully, plotting to drug Bea, then trap and kill her. Meanwhile, Maxine leaves the prison to undergo a double mastectomy, and Boomer is distraught when her application to be support person is denied.

episodes.name: Afterlife
episodes.overview: Bea struggles to recover in the wake of her attack. Ferguson returns from the burns unit and is placed in a medical hold under the supervision of Jake. Maxine is back after surgery and finds herself in the crossfire of huge tension between Boomer, Liz and Sonia.

episodes.name: Smitten
episodes.overview: When Bea discovers Allie has fallen back into drug addiction, Bea decides to remove Allie from Kaz’s control once and for all. In the process she exposes herself to Tina and Vera, showing her willingness to put her personal desire before here responsibilities as Top Dog. Kaz, desperate to reassert her own standing with the women, tries to resolve Doreen’s custody issue by sending a message from the Red Right Hand. While Jake managers to ingratiate himself with Vera and Will as a result of Kaz’s actions, Ferguson discovers Jake is a drug dealer and begins spinning her web around him. Vera, caught between her own desire and need to control Ferguson, engages in a risky game of sex and power with Jake. Meanwhile, Franky pursues Shayne in the hope of exposing Ferguson’s plan to undermine her trial and secure her release from Wentworth.

episodes.name: Eleventh Hour
episodes.overview: With Bea and Allie finally out as a couple, Kaz forms an alliance with Tina's Asian crew to help take Bea down. But when Jake smuggles a new batch of drugs into the prison for Tina, Bea gets wind of the stash and orders Tina to flush the gear. Tina refuses, citing Bea's weakening power-base, and her alliance with the RRH.

episodes.name: Seeing Red
episodes.overview: Bea awakes blissfully happy after a night with Allie but it is the eve of Ferguson's trial and the Freak has been relentless in putting the final touches to her scheme for freedom and exoneration. Liz becomes convinced of Sonia's innocence and then Don puts an offer to Liz which could change her life. Maxine is committed to the chemotherapy and her prison family rallies around her.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: It’s been four months since the fire at Wentworth and Bea and the other inmates have been housed offsite while they wait for construction to be completed. Series 4 sees Bea battle two formidable enemies. There is Kaz, made so dangerous by her extremist feminist ideology, who regards Bea as the great betrayer to the cause, and Ferguson, who is on a mission to exonerate herself for the death of Jess – the walls of Wentworth will not be enough to protect the Top Dog. Franky is focused on making it on the outside and while home life with Bridget isn’t perfect, they are navigating the terrain together. Vera has finally achieved the Governorship and while she thinks she is the upper hand with Ferguson, her control is short-lived. Liz, Doreen, Maxine and Boomer return in the latest series loyal to Bea but the bond is tested as Kaz sets out to undermine the status quo of Wentworth and weaknesses are exposed.

episodes.name: Scars
episodes.overview: Vera and Ferguson must deal with the fallout from the attack on Bea and Franky's past comes back to haunt her.

episodes.name: The Bitch Is Back
episodes.overview: Franky's trapped by her past, Vera takes desperate measures to foil Ferguson's self defence plea, Liz starts to regret her decision to testify against Sonia.

episodes.name: Nothing But the Truth
episodes.overview: Liz goes to Court to give her statement against Sonia and Frankie continues to try and find Mikes Killer.

episodes.name: Loose Ends
episodes.overview: While Liz languishes back in Wentworth waiting for Don to come to her rescue, Sonia is a free woman, and Franky plans her escape.

episodes.name: Belly Of The Beast
episodes.overview: Franky's escape plan could have fatal consequences and Liz is forced to take drastic measures to protect herself.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday, Vera
episodes.overview: The women become frustrated with the Top Dog’s lack of action against Lucy, and Vera receives a birthday present she will never forget.

episodes.name: The Pact
episodes.overview: Allie attempts to take out Ferguson and Will sets a trap to bust the drug ring

episodes.name: Think Inside The Box
episodes.overview: Frank's escape plan torpedoes her relationship with Bridget. Sonia leaves her frustration to Liz. Will makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Snakehead
episodes.overview: Will sets out to expose Jake, forcing Vera to make a hard decision; Franky engages help from the outside, while the net continues to tightens around Liz.

episodes.name: Mere Anarchy
episodes.overview: Franky faces danger from an unexpected source. Ferguson pulls strings to sideline Vera. Liz goes to extreme lengths to try to get a confession from Sonia.

episodes.name: Coup De Grace
episodes.overview: Ferguson delivers Vera her coup de grace, unleashing unforeseen consequences. Franky's escape plans are waylaid when Kaz persuades her to join forces to bring down the freak

episodes.name: Hell Bent
episodes.overview: Franky and Allie put their escape plan into action. Liz takes desperate measures to protect herself. Ferguson suspects she's living on borrowed time.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Bea awakes blissfully happy after a night with Allie but it is the eve of Ferguson's trial and the Freak has been relentless in putting the final touches to her scheme for freedom and exoneration. Liz becomes convinced of Sonia's innocence and then Don puts an offer to Liz which could change her life. Maxine is committed to the chemotherapy and her prison family rallies around her.

episodes.name: Clean Slate
episodes.overview: Franky is on the run. Vera is determined to prove Jake helped Ferguson break out. New arrival Rita Connors has her sights set on reconciliation with somebody from her past.

episodes.name: The Boxer
episodes.overview: Sonia returns from near death, hell bent on revenge on her poisoner. Boomer sets the cat among the pigeons when she implicates Liz.

episodes.name: Bleed Out
episodes.overview: After being shot Franky seeks Bridget’s help, but the police net is tightening. Meanwhile Kaz faces her toughest challenge when she warns Hutch to stop fight club.

episodes.name: Winter is Here
episodes.overview: Marie Winter arrives in Wentworth. Sonia will go to any lengths to reopen her Green Wall workshop. Will is haunted by what he has done to Ferguson and Jake scrambled to stop him flipping out.

episodes.name: Bitter Pill
episodes.overview: Vera finds herself under added pressure at work when the press criticise her reopening of the workshop. When Jake saves Liz’s life in a selfless act, Vera is forced her opinion of him.

episodes.name: Angel Of Wentworth
episodes.overview: As Sonia tries to spin her ‘Angel Of Wentworth’ PR into an innocence campaign, her past crimes threaten to derail her - and it could be fatal.

episodes.name: The Edge
episodes.overview: When Sonia is refused a move into protection, she sets up a plan to discredit Kaz and invalidate her position as top dog. With Marie onside, the plan is underway - but may have terrible repercussions for Allie.

episodes.name: Lovers And Fighters
episodes.overview: Kaz is released from the slot and the women realise she has profoundly changed, becoming Liz’s protector, Kaz also demonstrates a harder, tougher top doggedness.

episodes.name: Shallow Grave
episodes.overview: When Vera discovers a shocking secret, she must decide whether to tell police, or enter into a conspiracy.

episodes.name: Fractured
episodes.overview: Marie discovers that Liz may have witnessed the attack on Cherry Li and tries to protect her from Drago. Realising that Liz is ill and vulnerable, she takes advantage of her condition and convinces her that Boomer was responsible. Meanwhile, Vera, Will and Jake face a blackmail threat — someone else knows the dark secret they are protecting.

episodes.name: Indelible Ink
episodes.overview: Allie learns that Marie is getting surveillance photographs smuggled in that show the attack on her son, and Ruby panics.

episodes.name: Showdown
episodes.overview: The police close in on Vera, Will and Jake. While Rita takes drastic action to protect her sister.

episodes.name: Blood Wedding
episodes.overview: The prison is on tenterhooks as the war between Marie and Rita goes over the edge, after Rita has spent a very long time in isolation, she's out for revenge and so is Marie.

episodes.name: Payback
episodes.overview: Rita and Kaz form an alliance to bring down Marie, whilst Jake's jealously toward Vera is apparent as she forms a bond with a new colleague. Whilst a new acting deputy is voted in, it's someone we would least expect it to be.

episodes.name: Atonement
episodes.overview: Rita’s identity as a cop is under threat of being exposed to the other inmates, and Kaz embarks on a journey of self-discovery and atonement.

episodes.name: Karen
episodes.overview: Vera learns the sex of her baby whilst Marie and Kaz try and make amends, with Rita facing an impossible dilemma to keep her identity as a former cop a secret after being told to kill Kaz by the new inmate.

episodes.name: Ascension
episodes.overview: The Prisoners and Staff mourn the loss of their Tog Dog, while the hunt is on for the person who murdered her. Tensions remain very high as the investigation into the death stir up emotions for everyone.

episodes.name: Mother
episodes.overview: The Prisoners tensions are still extremely high as questions start to be answered about what happened. While Boomer has some long awaited catching up to do.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.overview: Ruby fights for her life as Marie continues to manipulate Will. The Prisoners are on edge as things are on the edge of imploding, the officers struggle to maintain the peace.

episodes.name: Protection
episodes.overview: The officers and prisoners find out what really happened to Ruby, as Marie's fall from grace continues her protector wants her silenced for good. Sean manipulates Linda into keeping quiet, and Liz meets her son for the first time in years.

episodes.name: Under Siege (1)
episodes.overview: Liz makes a desperate attempt to see her son, whilst Jake becomes concerned for Linda when she's still being manipulated by Sean. The women turn on Marie, as Marie prepares to make a bold plan to be exonerated for her crimes.

episodes.name: Under Siege (2)
episodes.overview: Marie stops at nothing to see that her plan go through, and with a fatal outcome and with nothing more to lose will Marie's plan to escape be successful, who lives and who dies?, and will the prison ever be the same again?

episodes.name: Resurrection
episodes.overview: After the siege many of the prisoners and officers struggle to rebuild their lives and cope with memories, as the new General Manager deals with the fallout from the siege and Will's mismanagement of the Prison.

episodes.name: Ends And Means
episodes.overview: With Marie being made the scapegoat for the siege she makes a desperate attempt to get into general, as Ruby fights for her innocence when an allegation is lodged against her, while Boomer continues her collision course with Lou.

episodes.name: Enemy of the State
episodes.overview: Young British ‘Wikileaker’, Judy Bryant, is remanded to Wentworth facing charges of stealing secrets from the Australian government. Is she a hero of the people, or an enemy of the state.

episodes.name: Revenant
episodes.overview: Allie refuses to guarantee Marie's safety after the Protection Unit gets shut down as the prison teeters on a knife edge, as news of Ferguson's survival sparks turmoil for the entire prison.

episodes.name: Fallout
episodes.overview: Judy incurs the wrath of Ann through Linda after she sabotages her presentation, while Allie is nervous when she has to contend with Lou's army of supporters and Ruby goes on the hunt to find Rita.

episodes.name: Fugitive
episodes.overview: Rita makes the ultimate sacrifice for Ruby, while Will clashes with Ann over day-to-day management of the prison, as Ferguson returns to Wentworth much to the dismay of inmates and staff.

episodes.name: Battle Lines
episodes.overview: On the edge of breaking point Allie finally faces Ferguson in an intense confrontation that brings back memories from years past. As Judy's father rejects her, she snaps with dangerous consequences.

episodes.name: Goldfish, Part 2
episodes.overview: The Prison remains on lockdown after Ann's attack, Joan continues treatment with Dr Miller, and the inmates are at breaking point resulting in a riot, as Linda suffers a flashback to the siege.

episodes.name: Monster
episodes.overview: Reb and Lou are rocked by a blast from the past with cult leader Sheila coming into the compound. Ferguson awaits news of her committal hearing as Vera enlists Allie to help her with devastating consequences.

episodes.name: The Enemy Within
episodes.overview: Vera makes a dangerous plan to bring down Ferguson, while Lou is on the warpath and is out for blood, as Allie realises her time as Top Dog is running out and Linda threatens to sue the department.

episodes.name: Rogue
episodes.overview: Allie tries to adjust to her permanent injuries; Marie takes advantage of Sheila.

episodes.name: Requiem
episodes.overview: Marie and Lou become unlikely allies, while retribution for Reb's life comes at a deadly price.

episodes.name: The Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: Boomer faces a crisis of courage when she takes on Lou for top dog and Judy convinces Allie to help with her bid for extradition.

episodes.name: Judas Kiss
episodes.overview: Allie plans her revenge against Lou, while a former nemesis of Ferguson enters Wentworth.

episodes.name: The Unknown Terrorist
episodes.overview: Finally exposed as Allie's attacker, a desperate Judy makes an audacious play for Lou's protection, while Ferguson fuels Eve's obsession with Jake.

episodes.name: One Eye Open
episodes.overview: Ferguson continues to manipulate Eve in her revenge plan on Jake, and Marie discovers Rita is a cop.

episodes.name: Collateral
episodes.overview: Allie makes a pact with Vera and Will which has devastating personal consequences while a crucial step in Boomer's quest for motherhood is achieved.

episodes.name: The Abyss
episodes.overview: Vera's battle with Ferguson pushes her to the edge of a moral abyss and Rita turns up the heat on Judy, seeing her as the weak link.

episodes.name: The Reckoning
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of Rita's exposure as a cop, the family fights for survival while Ann continues to unravel.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.overview: In the final countdown, the fate of everyone is uncertain.

9.name: The Final Sentence
9.overview: When the gates of Wentworth Correctional Centre open on the final season, three weeks have passed since the shivving of Allie (Kate Jenkinson). With Allie’s attacker still at large, no one, least of all the H1 family, realize that they have a terrorist and would-be murderer, Judy Bryant (Vivienne Awosoga), in their midst.
